properties.areaDesc: Hale; Motley; Hall; Childress; Floyd; Cottle
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:39AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lubbock TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain with accumulations of up to a tenth of an
inch are possible. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze
are also possible.

* WHERE...Portions of northwest and the Panhandle of Texas.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to noon CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are
possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning
commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icing will occur first on elevated road
surfaces and bridges, but icing of surface roads also should
be expected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY
